title: [Discussion] Branch upgrade cutoffs 2025
content: what was the cutoffs of todays counselling?

comments.body: Cse was 9.04 I think.
whoa dude i was genuinely expecting it to be higher
AIML i heard was around 8.4, not sure tho
Wow that's low. how many seats were free?

RR AIML was 8.38.
RR ECE was around 7.5 I think
https://preview.redd.it/7h4y72mx30jf1.jpeg?width=4080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=11ee1e93ea7c772fc4e321712d8c076f34992c1a
Lol yes, shocked me too.
I believe 25 seats lol
what the criteria if there is a tie?

This is the tiebraking order.
Sem 1 sgpa - sem 2 sgpa - maths-1 grade - python grade - maths 2 grade - 12th marks.
Might have messed up the orderÂ
Getting RR CSE seat thru branch change is easier than thru KCET - only happens at IIT BANGALORE
where did you get this from?
is it that everyone above 9.04 got cse rr if they wanted?
Everyone who applied for branch change with 9.04+ and were present there, yes
I went for it
Barely 2 or 3 were absent

btw what is the follow up procedure after getting branch change...
they mentioned 16th is the last date to pay for the branch change fee and then to collect a letter from mammtha ma'am or summin
then to submit that letter to your respective branch HOD??
Fr
I can't stop looking at your dp ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦
8.38 to be precise.
How are the buildings divided among the 6 branches in rrc, especially in the first year

These were the cutoffs:  
CSE at RR - 9.04  
AIML at RR - 8.38  
ECE at RR - 7.04

https://preview.redd.it/spocalfxo5jf1.png?width=395&format=png&auto=webp&s=a19ad3b5848d4655a4d412d045ac203d6142a3f0
First year entirely is in the F block , 2nd year onwards it'll be in BE block
Is it for all the branches
Yep
Thanks

8 for ece 
8.6 for aiml
Lil over 9 for cse

What if I missed the counselling for branch change
Can i still change my branch/campus if seats are vacant
If there's still vacancies and I missed the counselling can I still get a change in branch/campus?
I don't think you can do that, you'll have to talk to one of the seniors/teachers about it
